title: Quality Criteria-Based Design Strategies for Improving Online Course Quality

context.prior_knowledge: Online learning experience and intermediate-level language education knowledge
context.additional_context: Ensuring accessibility in BYOD environments and reflecting the characteristics of professional learners

learning_goals: Learners can apply an online lecture design framework compliant with QM (Quality Matters) standards and national criteria
Design at least three multi-interactive strategies to promote learner engagement
Develop language learning content that meets cultural inclusivity and accessibility standards
Submit project deliverables that demonstrate clear alignment between learning objectives, assessments, and rubrics
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
